spec_data.Name: perl-IO-Pager
spec_data.Description:
IO::Pager is used to locate an available pager and programmatically decide
whether or not to pipe a file handle's output to the pager.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:28:04 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Select a pager and pipe text to it if destination is a TTY
